channel.title: Register command

item.title: Register command
item.dc:creator: @infinitymagic infinitymagic
item.description:
@infinitymagic wrote:

yes. i want that if a player does ::register that it brings him to my forum.
forgot to say that i using InsidiaX V2.

Read full topic

item.title: Register command
item.dc:creator: @Untrimmed Untrimmed
item.description:
@Untrimmed wrote:

[quote=“Elfbow, post:2, topic:436049”]if (playerCommand.equals(“register”) && c.playerRights >= 3) {
for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++)
if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
c2.getPA().sendFrame126(“WEBSITE HERE!”, 12000);
}
}[/quote]
That is for doing ::register on another player. I believe he wants it so the player types ::register and it sends them to his forums site.

Read full topic
